entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 4 with temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness late this evening. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 4 with temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 12:12 PM AST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain. High 8.
